entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
